long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is designed to redirect traffic from minecraft.fandom.com to the new and updated wiki at minecraft.wiki. The aim is to promote the new wiki site and improve its SEO ranking, ensuring that the Minecraft community can easily find and access up-to-date information. By installing this extension, users will be seamlessly redirected to the new wiki pages, helping to shift the traffic and search engine recognition to the new site.
